Column.Name: Module Data
DG - EForm Columns
Column.DefaultValueFormula: ARRAY()/*IF( [DG - EForm Columns] <> NULL(), [DG - EForm Columns], IFERROR(DB_GETCOLUMNS([DG - Target EForm]), ARRAY()) )

Column.Name: Display - Reminder Target EForm
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Select the form the reminder is for", TRUE )

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1
[Context Form] <> NULL

Label.Text:
Define custom reminders that are not form based. For example a generic email that sends at the end of every quarter. Or a specific one-time email to send on a specified date.
These are different from the reminder rules in that they are not run in the context of specific records.

TextCriterion.Text: [Standalone Reminder] = TRUE
[Digest Email] <> TRUE
[System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE

Label.Text:
Each reminder has a rule which determines when an email would be sent to inform a user or group of users that a record is approaching a date of interest. The basic requirement to enable this function is that the date of interest is stored on the target form.
As example, these reminders can be used to send notifications in the following kinds of situations: - A record is a set period prior to being expired or be overdue - A record has expired or is now overdue - A record is a set period past expired or overdue - A record has been created
Select a reminder to view or edit

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1
[Context Form] <> NULL

Binding.Expression: IFERROR( ARRAY_SORT([Forms], $(i) $i), ARRAY( "Action", "Communication", "Contract", "Contract Contact", "Contract Review", "Defects Entry", "Defects Liability", "Extension", "Insurance", "Issue", "Key Performance Indicator", "KPI Performance", "KPI Target", "Meeting", "Milestone", "Multiple Award Contract", "Novation", "Panel", "Penalty Clause", "Purchase Order", "Risk", "Security", "Service Level Agreement", "Insurance", "Transition", "Variation", "Warranty" ) )

Label.Text: Give a name to the reminder
What form is the reminder for

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula:
HASH( "Unique Reference", ARRAY([Reminder Selection]),
"Reminder Purpose", ARRAY([Display - Description of Reminder]),
"Description", ARRAY([Display - Reminder Summary]),
"Reminder Frequency", ARRAY("Recurring"),
"System Wide Reminder", ARRAY(TRUE),
"Reminder Type", ARRAY("Context Date"),
"Context Form", ARRAY([Display - Reminder Target EForm]) )

Label.Text: Select a status update rule to view or edit

TextCriterion.Text: [RecordID] = [Local].[Status Update Selection]

Binding.Expression: IF([Unlock Remove]= TRUE, "Cancel Delete", "Delete status transition")

Event.Name: Push Reminder Information to Selected Line
